table.name: Sea of Moonshae Encounters
table.caption: Sea of Moonshae Encounters
rows: {@dice 2d4} {@creature Bullywug Warrior|XMM|Bullywug Warriors} try to climb up the side of the ship and loot it of valuables.
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Hunter Shark|XMM|Hunter Sharks} begin following the ship.
{@dice 1d6} {@creature Merfolk Skirmisher|XMM|Merfolk Skirmishers} investigate the ship.
A pod of {@dice 3d10} {@creature Killer Whale|XMM|Killer Whales} races the ship.
One of the characters spots a bottle bobbing in the sea not far from the ship. Inside is a message and a map (see "{@book Message in a Bottle|FRAiF|5|Message in a Bottle}" later in this chapter).
A {@creature Noble|XMM} clings to a piece of driftwood.
A Ffolk merchant vessel bound for the Sword Coast hails the characters and offers to trade.
A Norlander whaling ship approaches to ask if anyone has seen whales nearby.
The ship enters an area of Rusted Sea (see "Moonshaes Terrain").
{@dice 2d4} {@creature Sahuagin Warrior|XMM|Sahuagin Warriors} riding {@creature Reef Shark|XMM|Reef Sharks} spot the ship. They follow and try to sneak aboard.
A pack of {@dice 1d4} {@creature Plesiosaurus|XMM|Plesiosauruses} closes on the ship and tries to sink it.
The characters spot the wreckage of a trading vessel that hit a hidden sandbar (see "{@book Wreck of the Silverhand|FRAiF|5|Wreck of the Silverhand}" later in this chapter).
A {@creature Giant Shark|XMM} ambushes the ship.
The characters spot an {@creature Archelon|XMM}. It ignores them unless attacked.

The ship passes an island where {@dice 1d6} {@creature Pirate|XMM|Pirates} led by a {@creature Pirate Captain|XMM} have been left behind after a mutiny. The pirates hail the characters and pretend to be stranded travelers.

A Norlander longship crewed by fifty {@creature Guard|XMM|Guards} armed with battleaxes and led by a {@creature Berserker Commander|XMM} searches for a ship to capture or a coastal settlement to raid.
{@dice 1d6} {@creature Frost Giant|XMM|Frost Giants} living on a passing island pelt the ship with stones.
A {@creature Storm Giant|XMM} strides along the sea floor on its way to Maelstrom.
A {@creature Dragon Turtle|XMM} sleeps half submerged as the ship passes. It might be mistaken for a small island.
The ship sails near the lair of a {@creature Kraken|XMM}.
